data.message: Hard gate smoke suite with pre-push hook and GitHub Actions: Created: (1) .git/hooks/pre-push - local hook blocks push on test failure, (2) .github/workflows/smoke.yml - CI blocks merge on test failure. Tests that aren't enforced are now enforced.
data.task: Hard gate smoke suite with pre-push hook and GitHub Actions
data.outcome: Created: (1) .git/hooks/pre-push - local hook blocks push on test failure, (2) .github/workflows/smoke.yml - CI blocks merge on test failure. Tests that aren't enforced are now enforced.
